examples.description: Given exchange rates of -> Given the pre-generated 2021 company, not VAT registered -> Given a sent USD invoice to Uncle Sam dated on 2020-02-19 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ $120.00 -> And a payment for £35.00 ($64.00) is received on 2020-02-21 -> And a payment for £33.00 ($56.00) is received on 2020-02-23 -> Then it should be valid -> And the invoice currency revaluations are deleted and recalculated from 2020-02-18 -> And it should have ledger entries -> And the first payment should have ledger entries -> And the second payment should have ledger entries
